metadata.synopsis: After her talk with Archivist Korrilla calls player to talk to her. There's an alternative greeting, if the player interrupts their talk with Archivist and talks to Archivist first.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. teleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_ArchiveADTrigger3. Wait for AD to finish

1.speaker: Korrilla
1.text: Well, well, well. Look what we have here.
